author: Mental Outlaw
description:
In this video we take a look at how China has monetized toilet paper in public bathrooms. You can pay 0.5 Yuan (about $0.07) or watch a 30 second ad to receive a small portion of toilet paper to clean yourself. Will this addition to the social credit system curtail people stealing free TP or will monetized toilet paper cause a bigger mess in Chinese bathrooms.
